posts.title: Glow In The Dark Body Paint
posts.content: Stand out from the crowd of weirdos at Burning Man with a crazy outfit courtesy of some glow in the dark body paint. You’ll be able to unleash your imagination and create jaw-dropping luminescent designs that won’t fade as you dance and sweat the night away.

posts.title: Mechanical Automatic Watch
posts.content: The mechanical automatic watch is the unique timepiece that’s powered solely through kinetic energy. It uses your body’s natural movements to power itself for up to 36 hours and features an eye-catching display that’s easy to read.

posts.title: Realistic Tyrion Lannister Mask
posts.content: Amaze every Game of Thrones fan you encounter on the street by becoming the living embodiment of Tyrion Lannister with this incredible realistic mask. It’s crafted from medical-grade silicone and is entirely sculpted, painted, and decorated by hand.

posts.title: Marshmallow Roasting Fishing Pole
posts.content: Say goodbye to unevenly cooked campfire treats by grilling them up using this marshmallow roasting fishing pole. Simply place your marshmallows or hot dogs on the stainless steel frame and gently lower it to the ideal height using the included fishing pole.

posts.title: Barbecue Dining Table
posts.content: Set up an impromptu dining room virtually anywhere using the barbecue dining table. This sturdy table sets up around the specialized grill set – sold separately – to provide you and your friends with a sturdy surface you can use to eat or prepare meals on.

posts.title: Star Trek Communicator Badge
posts.content: Complete your Starfleet costume while simultaneously adding to your vast collection of geeky memorabilia  with the Star Trek communicator badge. The badge is crafted with extreme detail in order to perfectly replicate the ones used on the show.

posts.title: Trucker Multi-Tool
posts.content: No emergency car kit should be without the compact trucker multi-tool. This must-have tool is not only remarkably durable, but comes packed with fourteen useful tools such as a glass breaker and a hatchet blade so that you’re ready for anything.

posts.title: 4-In-1 Woodsman Multi-Tool Axe
posts.content: Conquer any task you encounter in the outdoors single-handedly using this 4-in-1 woodsman multi-tool axe. This extraordinarily versatile tool features a stainless steel blade and can be used as either a bow saw, mallet, stake puller, or stand alone axe.

posts.title: Downrange Tactical Tomahawk
posts.content: Arm yourself for battle with the downrange tactical tomahawk and live to see another day in the post-apocalyptic world. The incredibly versatile design provides you with an array of useful tools such as a hammer, axe, and pry bar in a lightweight package.

posts.title: Shiatsu Neck & Back Tissue Massager
posts.content: Who says you have to go to a fancy spa to get a deep soothing rub down? This shiatsu neck and back tissue massager comes with a row of 8 deep-kneading shiatsu massage nodes that you can set to 1 of 3 speeds for a relaxing and soothing massage.

posts.title: Nutritional Dog Condiments
posts.content: Make Rex’s dry food a little more palatable by topping it off with these nutritional dog condiments. They feature a great taste and are made with natural and healthy ingredients in addition to 20 nutrients that include vitamins, minerals, and anti-oxidants.

posts.title: Peeping Cat Wall Hook
posts.content: Add a little whimsy to your humble abode by staying organized with this peeping cat wall hook. The moment you hang a bag or garment on the cat’s tail, the little kitty cat pops his head out of the box to say hello and then goes back in after the weight is removed.
